definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
